wallDescription.label: Description of wall / descrizione unità stratigrafica muraria
wallDescription.description: layers, stones used (form, dimension), bricks used (form, dimension), installation system (regular, random, uneven,…), traces of processing, quarry/factory marks, decorative elements

stones.label: Stone type / tipo di pietra
stones.description: If applicable, type and provenance of the stone used

typologyType.label: Typology and Type / Tipologia e tipo

distinguishingCriteriaDescription.label: Distinguishing Criteria from
distinguishingCriteriaDescription.description: If necessary indicate distinguishing criteria from multiple SUs in the form SU Number:criterion,criterion;

layerInclusions.label: Inclusions
layerInclusions.description: Natural inclusions and their quantity and size (fine, medium, coarse pebbles/gravel, cobbles, boulders), shape (rounded, sub-rounded, angular), concentrations (sporadic, low, middle, high, very high), sorting (well, moderately, poorly, very poorly sorted)

layerFindsDescription.label: Finds quantities
layerFindsDescription.description: Quantities and general description of found material
